review: I had high hopes for this webcam, but it fell short in several key areas. While the build quality is solid and the 1080p resolution is appreciated, the noise reduction microphone was hit or miss, often failing to filter out background noise effectively. The setup process was more complicated than expected, and the lack of clear documentation made it frustrating. Given my experience with high-quality gear, this webcam just doesn't meet the standards I've come to expect. The value for money is questionable, especially considering the reliability issues reported by other users.
